alert.note: Alert for Pulaski; Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 3:56PM CDT until May 15 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Saline County in central Arkansas... Central Pulaski County in central Arkansas... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 356 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Salem in Saline County, or 8 miles north of Benton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Little Rock... Benton... Bryant... Southwest Little Rock... Haskell... Shannon Hills... Otter Creek... Ironton... Mabelvale... Salem in Saline County... Geyer Springs... Chenal Valley... Alexander... Baseline... Bauxite... Avilla... Congo... Vimy Ridge... Grape... Bland... This includes the following highways... Interstate 30 between mile markers 112 and 134. Interstate 430 between mile markers 1 and 4. Interstate 530 near mile marker 5. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
